metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4425 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Jansson 2.7 and earlier allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (deep recursion, stack consumption, and crash) via crafted JSON data. It was discovered that Jansson incorrectly handled certain JSON files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjansson4 - 2.7-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jansson package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7-3ubuntu0.1').
